extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to create issues on Redmine from the context menu.

config_visibleProjects_label.message: Visible Projects (id or identifier, empty means "show all")

config_visibleStatuses_label.message: Available Statuses (id value or label, empty means "allow all")

config_defaultTitleCleanupPattern_label.message: Parts to be Removed from Subject (regular expression)

config_placeholders_description.message:
Available placeholders:
%headers% : headers of the original message
%body% : body of the original message
%body_for_markdown% : body of the original message, converted to keep linebreaks in the Markdown format
